alert.note: Alert for Iron; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:10PM EDT until July 28 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/ FOR WESTERN IRON...SOUTHEASTERN GOGEBIC AND SOUTHEASTERN ONTONAGON COUNTIES... At 810 PM EDT/710 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Watersmeet to near Woodboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of western Iron, southeastern Gogebic and southeastern Ontonagon Counties, including the following locations... Hagerman Lake, Paint Lake, Tamarack Lake, Gibbs City, Golden Lake and Bond Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
